DaparToolshed 0.99.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Displays a correlation matrix of the quantitative data of a numeric matrix.

Source: R/plots_corr_matrix.R, R/mod_plots_corr_matrix.R
corrmatrix_plot.Rd

A shiny Module.

corrMatrixPlot(qData, rate = 0.5, showValues = FALSE)

mod_corrmatrix_plot_ui(id)

mod_corrmatrix_plot_server(
  id,
  qData,
  rate = reactive({     0.5 }),
  showValues = reactive({     FALSE })
)

Arguments

qData

xxx

rate

xxx. Default value is 0.9

showValues

Default is FALSE.

id

xxx

Value

A colored correlation matrix

Author

Samuel Wieczorek, Enora Fremy

Examples

library(QFeatures)

data(ft)
corrMatrixPlot(assay(ft, 1))



if (interactive()){
library(QFeatures)
library(DaparToolshed)
data(ft)
ui <- mod_corrmatrix_plot_ui('plot')

server <- function(input, output, session) {
 mod_corrmatrix_plot_server('plot',
                            qData = reactive({assay(ft[[1]])})
                            )
 }
shinyApp(ui=ui, server=server)
}
